input_query: You plan to visit 4 European cities for 18 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Naples for 7 days. You would like to meet your friends at Naples between day 7 and day 13 to tour together. You plan to stay in Stuttgart for 6 days. You want to spend 6 days in Munich. You want to spend 2 days in Dublin. You plan to visit relatives in Dublin between day 6 and day 7. Here are the cities that have direct flights: Munich and Naples, Dublin and Naples, Naples and Stuttgart, Munich and Dublin. Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 18 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
